content:
ae_toKernel_eq_one and measurableSet_toKernel_eq_one disappeared from Mathlib/Probability/Kernel/Disintegration/CdfToKernel.lean in #10603

@Rémy Degenne, was this intentional? (I'm happy to assume it was, this just caused a mysterious diff on nightly-testing that I wanted to double check on.)

Yes it was intentional. They were introduced in a recent PR in preparation for that one but a refactor of a proof made them useless, so I removed them. I did not deprecate because they were very recent and their only purpose was to help with that proof.
